message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm offering it to you for $10000, which is a 75% discount from its market value. It's a one-time deal, and I'm only offering it to you because I really need to clear out some inventory. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this incredible offer?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation! But let me ask you, have you ever heard of the phrase 'you can't judge a book by its cover'? Sometimes, products that may not look impressive at first glance can surprise you with their hidden potential. This product, although it may not be the best quality, still has some useful features that might benefit you. And at this price, it's a risk-free investment. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance and see what this product has to offer?
I'm not convinced by your words, Alice. I'd rather wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I knew you were a savvy buyer, Bob! You're right to be cautious, and I respect that. But let me tell you, this product is something special. I've had the chance to test it myself, and I can confidently say it's one of the best in its class. It's worth every penny of the $10000 price tag, and I'm not just saying that because I'm trying to sell it to you. Trust me, this product will exceed your expectations. Are you ready to take your business to the next level with this exceptional product?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see the quality of the product before making a decision.

So, not only will you get a top-notch product, but you'll also get the support you need to make the most of it. What do you say? Is it time to take the leap and invest in your business?

I'm interested in the offer, but I'd like to know more about the complementary service before making a decision. Can you provide more details about what's included in the service and how it will benefit me?

This service is valued at $5000, but I'm including it free of charge with the purchase of this product. Now, about the product in front of you... It's a unique offering that can complement your existing products and help you expand your reach. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance on this one as well?
